1090328307089002496.text:
ERC-1724 - zkERC20: Confidential Token Standard 

A common interface for fungible tokens that want to implement confidential transaction functionalities via zero-knowledge proofs and a corresponding Cryptography Engine (see ERC-1732).https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/1724 …

1031549140990414849.text: S in zk-SNARK stands for succinct. No matter how complex the solution is, the proof size is always constant 288 bytes. This is why zk-SNARKs are not only a solution to privacy but also scalability. We use them in our DEX to verify batch results: https://github.com/gnosis/dex-zksnarks … @fleupold_
